---
agent: agent
---
not use echo statements for debugging purposes.
not use sleep statements for timing control.
not put any comments in the code.
apply DDD (Domain-Driven Design) principles strictly.
apply SOLID principles strictly.
apply DRY (Don't Repeat Yourself) principles strictly.
apply KISS (Keep It Simple, Stupid) principles strictly.
apply clean code principles strictly.
ensure high code readability and maintainability.
ensure cyclomatic complexity of functions is below 10.
